content.rendered:
Pranita is a doctorate level educator and higher education consultant with more than nine years of corporate experience coupled with a broad range of functional and managerial skills. She has worked in international student recruitment and partnerships in UK and abroad.

Pranita has three years teaching experience and currently working as an Academic Assessor at Regent College. Research interests and core competencies include Business & Organisational Strategy, Higher Education, Cross Culture Management, Leadership and Strategic Marketing. Alongside her professional career, Pranita is an active Rotary International member giving service in many posts, leading several major projects.
